description.desc: Designed and built blog summarizer, by reverse engineering ChatGPT API calls to send and receive AI responses, saving up to 5 hours per week of users.
Integrated LLMs into a highly customisable platform, by using ReactFlow where the users can drag and drop AI Providers and File importers to chat with the model based on the data extracted.
Designed and built the official website of the club within a tight timeframe of 4 days, by leading a group of 4 developers and 2 designers.
